title: Ocean Token Distribution
description: Get on the whitelist for the Ocean Token distribution during the network launch starting from February 5th. The KYC process is open until March 19th 2019.

platforms.name: Fractal
list: participated in the Ocean Seed or Pre-Launch phase in March 2018
prefer your data to be stored exclusively in the EU under GDPR

platforms.name: CoinList
list: have an existing CoinList or AngelList account
have participated in Filecoin, Blockstack, Origin or any other project run by CoinList

tokeninfo.title: The Ocean Token
tokeninfo.description: Ocean Protocol uses an ERC20 token, as a means of value exchange, to incentivize keepers of the network and for staking & curation. Ocean Tokens will be issued in a limited supply over an extended period of time.
metrics: No minimum, no maximum individual contribution limit
Token price will be determined at network launch
